thread.title: Temperatures set to rise in UAE
thread.title_full: Temperatures set to rise in UAE

title: Temperatures set to rise in UAE

organizations.name: the national center of meteorology & seismology

text:
Temperatures set to rise in UAE Web Team   | Last updated on February 8, 2017 at 08.41 am Share 
(khaleej Times) It will mostly be a sunny day with highest temperature touching 23 degrees. It is a clear day for UAE today with light clouds gathering in few parts. It can get a bit hazy at times. The broadcaster, The National Center of Meteorology & Seismology has predicted that temperatures might rise. The humidity is likely to increase over some western coastal and internal areas by night and early morning tomorrow. There might also be a probability of fog/mist formation. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 8, 2017 The highest temperature for the day would be around 23 degree Celsius and lowest at 19 degrees.
